1.content:
It was beginning to shape up as a good day for Ashley. She had woken up early and went to the bus station where she had decided to test out her abilities on a larger crowd of people. Ashley had been born with the incredible gift to shrink people. She hadn't realized how to do it until she was 18, when she accidentally shrank a couple of people who were being loud in the movie theater. Since then she had been honing the art of the shrink, and had gotten good enough to make the shrinkies almost invincible. And today was the day she was going to try shrinking on a large scale. She walked into the greyhound station and looked around. There were maybe 75 people waiting to board buses going all over. She walked over to the corner and started to concentrate really hard and in the blink of an eye the place was empty... at least to a normal person. She went and gathered all the tiny people and put them into a pink coin purse. But before she left, she shrank one of the buses. She wanted to cover her tracks and make sure authorities would be looking for a greyhound bus. She went and picked up the bus unsure of where to put it, and then a woman walked into the station wearing tight low cut jeans and a white tank top. She had a large bag she was pulling being her and when she got in she laid the bag down and kneeled down to look in it. Ashley was on her way out when she noticed the woman’s butt crack was showing. She got an idea and went over and hovered the bus, which was only about an inch long, over the woman’s massive ass crack, and let go. She watched the bus land square in the top of the crack and sink until only the very back of the bus showed. The woman felt this and immediately reached her hand back to fix her pants and in the process pushed the bus further down pulling her thong over top and covering it up. She glanced at Ashley as she stood up. Ashley gave her a polite wave and hurried out of the building. Little did Ashley know, the bus that she had shrunken had 5 passengers already on board. After Ashley had left the woman went to go sit down, and when she did her thong pulled tight pulling the bus just above her anus. She sat there playing on her phone waiting for her friends to get there, as the tiny bus was compacted by her enormous ass. After about 15 minutes she started to feel something tickling her anus, and got up to go to check what it was. One of the tiny passengers had thought to start honking the bus horn to try and get their unaware captors attention. The woman walked to the bathroom and entered the stall. She undid her pants and dropped them, then proceeded to probe her ass for the intruder.
When she started walking the bus started shaking violently and two of the passengers were thrown out the emergency exit. The other three were in the bus with one of them hanging onto the frame half in the bus with his legs hanging out.
She stuck her finger in her crack and found a tiny object and brought it to her face. To her it just looked like a little matchbox car just smaller. She thought back to seeing the girl when she had first arrived and realized that she must have thought it was funny to put things down people’s butt cracks. She threw the bus on ground and stomped on it in a rage. Her platform sandal flattened the bus and the tiny people inside. She stood up and put her pants back on and walked back to her seat.
When she pulled the bus out of her crack the tiny person hanging by the frame fell and landed with a splash in the freezing water of the toilet. He watched as she pulled her pants back up and walked out of the bathroom, leaving him to suffer at the whim of the next unaware woman to use the toilet. But he may have been considered lucky compared to the two tinys left in her ass. One of whom, when she fell landed on the sticky skin of the giant woman’s anus. The other got smushed between her powerful cheeks and stuck to the slightly sweaty skin. As the giant woman walked back to her seat, the tiny on her anus was going through hell, as her ass swayed the tiny woman was sucked up into her anus with just her leg sticking out. As the lady sat in her seat the tiny woman was chewed up and sucked all the way inside.
Where did Ashley head to next after she left the station?
1.title: Prologue

151.content: Ashley's next station was a shoe store. She went into the shoe store seeing lots of people in the store. She looked around hoping she would see something that would interest her but there was just too many people. She then starts to take a deep breath and focused. After ashley blinked the store was once again empty. Ashley managed to see the people on the ground panicking. She starts to collect them and putting them into her purse. She walked around the shoe store now that she can take her time. She started to open her purse and putting some tinies into shoes. Then something catched ashley's eyes. A mother and her daugther came into the store. They looked around searching for a pair of shoes. Ashley then got an idea. She walked to the two and asked them what they were looking for. The mother told her that she was searching for a new pair of sneakers for her 10 year old daughter. Ashley then went to get a pair. She looked around then seeing a pair of pink sneakers. She opened her purse and drops all of the remaining tinies into the sneaker. Ashley proceeds to go back to the customers and puts the sneaker on the ground. Ashley took the shoe off from the kid as ashley could smell a strong sweaty odor comming from her foot. Ashley smiled and grabbed the sneaker with the tinies in them. She puts the foot in as the tinies got crushed by the gigantic foot. The tinies that managed to survive will now endure the sweat and the odor of the socked foot. Meanwhile the girl fell in love with the sneakers as she was ready to purchase them. Ashley said that they were free as the girl thanked her and went
151.title: Yes

info.brief_description: A girl named Ashley has the ability to shrink people
info.description:
This is my first story here, I had planned on it being a set story, but instead decided to open it up as an interactive. It's about a girl named Ashley who has the power to shrink people and enjoys watching others torture them unaware.

The main things I want in the story are:
Ass crush, insertion, unaware

But I'm also fine with most everything else, just no male giants. (Sorry, not my thing)
